param([string] $userAzureLoginId = $userAzureLoginId, [string] $userAzureLoginPassword = $userAzureLoginPassword)
Install-Module -Name "Az.Accounts" -Force
Install-Module -Name "Az.Resources" -RequiredVersion 4.4.1 -Force
$PWord = ConvertTo-SecureString -String $userAzureLoginPassword -AsPlainText -Force
$User = $userAzureLoginId
$Credential = New-Object -TypeName System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -ArgumentList $User, $PWord
Connect-AzAccount -Credential $Credential
Import-Module Az.Resources
$timestamp=Get-Date -Format 'MM-dd-yyyy-HH-mm-ss'
$ServicePrincipalName = 'my-ZTNA-'+$timestamp
$ServicePrincipal = New-AzAdServicePrincipal -DisplayName $ServicePrincipalName -Role Reader
$obj = (Get-AzADApplication -DisplayName $ServicePrincipalName).ObjectId
$aadAppClientSecret = New-Guid
$date = Get-Date
$aadAppClientSecretSecureString = ConvertTo-SecureString $aadAppClientSecret -AsPlainText -Force
$newCredential = New-AzADAppCredential -ObjectId $obj -Password $aadAppClientSecretSecureString -StartDate $date -EndDate $date.AddYears(1)
$tenantID = (Get-AzSubscription -SubscriptionName $subscriptionName).TenantId
$aadAppClientId = $ServicePrincipal.ApplicationId
$userObjectId=(Get-AzADUser -UserPrincipalName $userAzureLoginId).Id
$DeploymentScriptOutputs = @{}
$DeploymentScriptOutputs['tenantID'] = $tenantID
$DeploymentScriptOutputs['aadAppClientId'] = $aadAppClientId
$DeploymentScriptOutputs['aadAppClientSecret'] = $aadAppClientSecret
$DeploymentScriptOutputs['userObjectId'] = $userObjectId
